name: 100% Hot-Blooded

Permanent

effect: Effect: Search for up to 1 copy of each "Homura Mitomon" and "Koharu Utatane" Ninja card in your Deck, show them(it) to your opponent and place them(it) in you hand. Then, shuffle your Deck. While this Mission is in your Chakra area, your "Homura Mitomon" and "Koharu Utatane" Ninjas get +3/+3.

effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Animal | Tortoise Ninja | Platoon

name: Rules for Medical Ninjas
effect:
Permanent

3 + ) Draw 1 card.

effect:

name: Sealing Barrier
effect:
Counter

name: Sealing Jutsu: Breaking the Lion's Roar
effect:
Requirements: " Manipulation" Combat Attribute + "An Entrance cost of 4 or more"
Target: 1 Ninja battling against the user
Effect: Remove the target from game. Additionally, look through your opponent's Deck, and remove all the Ninja cards with the same name as the target's from game. In that case, your opponent shuffles their Deck.

name: Search Party
effect:
Permanent (1)

name: Secret Meeting
effect:
Permanent (3)
